name: Tic Tac Roll
description:
Tic Tac Roll is a spin on the classic game "Tic-Tac-Toe". The issue with tic-tac-toe is that it is a "solved" game, meaning that there is a "perfect" way to play, and if both players play perfectly, neither will ever win. In this game, there is no "draw" condition, and one player has to win.

Everything was made in 48 Hours for the GMTK Game Jam.

I made the Art, Code and sound effects (using Aseprite, Unity, SFXR), and the music was made by a friend during the 48 hours.

How To Play

Click on your dice and then a board space to move the dice onto it (if you click on your dice again you can unselect it)
Click on a dice that is already on the board to roll it, which will give you a chip
Move the chip onto the board (same way as dice) to use it

Get 3 of your coloured dice in a row to win
Each time you win, you get a car
Each time you lose, you lose a card
Get 3 cards to get the jackpot
